page.title: 10PLANT NURSERY AT MIDDLETON
page.content: The nursery is owned and run as a family business by Mr Wright.He has five large greenhouses and a further acre of land.In the greenhouses he has over 60 varieties of bedding plants,and some flowers for cutting.They are watered twice a day in very hot weather once before lunch and again in the evening.On cooler days they are watered once. Lettuce,tomatoes and strawberries are also grown.On the acre of land when visited,he was growing chrysanthemums ready for the autumn.Produce is taken to Corby market on Thursdays,Fridays and Saturdays.A small shop by the house caters for passing customers.You can also order bouquets and wreaths.
